title: Best of the Program | Guest: Bill O'Reilly | 10/4/19
description:
A woman just told AOC that we need to EAT OUR BABIES to combat climate change! Glenn’s new special, “Ukraine: The Democrats’ Russia,” is available now for FREE. Not only is Biden’s involvement assured, but we have the audio that helped make DNC collusion FRONT-PAGE news in Ukraine. And surprisingly, the whole ordeal started with a “chalupa.” Viewers call in with their takeaways. And Bill O’Reilly can say for sure that Trump is obsessed with Ukraine NOT because of Biden, but because the DNC made it personal.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
